blocks.content: Function returning the subspace topology induced by the topology ` y ` and the set ` x ` . (Contributed by FL, 20-Sep-2010.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 1-May-2015.)

blocks.name: df-topn
blocks.content: Define the topology extractor function. This differs from ~ df-tset when a structure has been restricted using ~ df-ress ; in this case the ` TopSet ` component will still have a topology over the larger set, and this function fixes this by restricting the topology as well. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: restfn
blocks.content: The subspace topology operator is a function on pairs. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 1-May-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm restfn() {
  |- wfn(crest, cxp(universe, universe))
} = {
  fnmpt2i(hs0, hs1, crest, universe, universe, crn(cmpt(hs2, cv(hs0), cin(cv(hs2), cv(hs1)))))
  df-rest(hs0, hs1, hs2)
  rnex(cmpt(hs2, cv(hs0), cin(cv(hs2), cv(hs1))))
  mptex(hs2, cv(hs0), cin(cv(hs2), cv(hs1)))
  vex(hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs1.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs2.c(cv(hs0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm restfn() {
  ⊢ |`t[Fn](𝕌 × 𝕌)
} = {
  fnmpt2i(hs0, hs1, crest, universe, universe, ran((hs2 ∈ hs0 ↦(hs2 ⋂ hs1))))
  df-rest(hs0, hs1, hs2)
  rnex((hs2 ∈ hs0 ↦(hs2 ⋂ hs1)))
  mptex(hs2, hs0, (hs2 ⋂ hs1))
  vex(hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs1.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs2.c(hs0)
}

blocks.name: topnfn
blocks.content: The topology extractor function is a function on the universe. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: restval
blocks.content: The subspace topology induced by the topology ` J ` on the set ` A ` . (Contributed by FL, 20-Sep-2010.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 1-May-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm restval(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wceq(co(c0, crest, c2), crn(cmpt(s0, c0, cin(cv(s0), c2)))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  syl2an(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wceq(co(c0, crest, c2), crn(cmpt(s0, c0, cin(cv(s0), c2)))), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c2, universe))
  elex(c0, c1)
  elex(c2, c3)
  mpd3an3(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c2, universe), wceq(co(c0, crest, c2), crn(cmpt(s0, c0, cin(cv(s0), c2)))), wcel(crn(cmpt(s0, c0, cin(cv(s0), c2))), universe))
  adantr(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c2, universe), wcel(crn(cmpt(s0, c0, cin(cv(s0), c2))), universe))
  syl(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(crn(cmpt(s0, c0, cin(cv(s0), c2))), universe), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cin(cv(s0), c2)), universe))
  mptexg(s0, c0, universe, cin(cv(s0), c2))
  rnexg(cmpt(s0, c0, cin(cv(s0), c2)), universe)
  ovmpt2ga(hs0, hs1, c0, universe, c2, universe, crn(cmpt(s0, c0, cin(cv(s0), c2))), universe, crest, crn(cmpt(s0, cv(hs0), cin(cv(s0), cv(hs1)))))
  rneqd(cmpt(s0, cv(hs0), cin(cv(s0), cv(hs1))), cmpt(s0, c0, cin(cv(s0), c2)), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)))
  mpteq12dv(s0, cv(hs0), cin(cv(s0), cv(hs1)), c0, cin(cv(s0), c2), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)))
  simpl(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  ineq2d(cv(s0), cv(hs1), c2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)))
  simpr(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  df-rest(hs0, hs1, s0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(crn(cmpt(s0, c0, cin(cv(s0), c2))))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(universe)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(crn(cmpt(s0, c0, cin(cv(s0), c2))))
  diff.wa.s(s0, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs1), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm restval(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3)→(c0[|`t]c2)= ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦(s0 ⋂ c2))))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  syl2an(c0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c3, (c0[|`t]c2)= ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦(s0 ⋂ c2))), c0 ∈ 𝕌, c2 ∈ 𝕌)
  elex(c0, c1)
  elex(c2, c3)
  mpd3an3(c0 ∈ 𝕌, c2 ∈ 𝕌, (c0[|`t]c2)= ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦(s0 ⋂ c2))), ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦(s0 ⋂ c2)))∈ 𝕌)
  adantr(c0 ∈ 𝕌, c2 ∈ 𝕌, ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦(s0 ⋂ c2)))∈ 𝕌)
  syl(c0 ∈ 𝕌, ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦(s0 ⋂ c2)))∈ 𝕌, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦(s0 ⋂ c2))∈ 𝕌)
  mptexg(s0, c0, universe, (s0 ⋂ c2))
  rnexg((s0 ∈ c0 ↦(s0 ⋂ c2)), universe)
  ovmpt2ga(hs0, hs1, c0, universe, c2, universe, ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦(s0 ⋂ c2))), universe, crest, ran((s0 ∈ hs0 ↦(s0 ⋂ hs1))))
  rneqd((s0 ∈ hs0 ↦(s0 ⋂ hs1)), (s0 ∈ c0 ↦(s0 ⋂ c2)), (hs0 = c0 ∧ hs1 = c2))
  mpteq12dv(s0, hs0, (s0 ⋂ hs1), c0, (s0 ⋂ c2), (hs0 = c0 ∧ hs1 = c2))
  simpl(hs0 = c0, hs1 = c2)
  ineq2d(s0, hs1, c2, (hs0 = c0 ∧ hs1 = c2))
  simpr(hs0 = c0, hs1 = c2)
  df-rest(hs0, hs1, s0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦(s0 ⋂ c2))))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(universe)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦(s0 ⋂ c2))))
  diff.wa.s(s0, hs0 = c0, hs1 = c2)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs1, c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: elrest
blocks.content: The predicate "is an open set of a subspace topology". (Contributed by FL, 5-Jan-2009.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Dec-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm elrest(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wb(wcel(c4, co(c0, crest, c2)), wrex(s0, c0, wceq(c4, cin(cv(s0), c2)))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
} = {
  syl6bb(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(c4, co(c0, crest, c2)), wrex(s0, c0, wceq(c4, cin(cv(s0), c2))), wcel(c4, crn(cmpt(s0, c0, cin(cv(s0), c2)))))
  eleq2d(c4, co(c0, crest, c2), crn(cmpt(s0, c0, cin(cv(s0), c2))), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)))
  restval(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3)
  elrnmpti(s0, c4, cmpt(s0, c0, cin(cv(s0), c2)), c0, cin(cv(s0), c2))
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c0, cin(cv(s0), c2)))
  inex1(cv(s0), c2)
  vex(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm elrest(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3)→(c4 ∈(c0[|`t]c2)↔ ∃(s0 ∈ c0, c4 =(s0 ⋂ c2))))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
} = {
  syl6bb((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3), c4 ∈(c0[|`t]c2), ∃(s0 ∈ c0, c4 =(s0 ⋂ c2)), c4 ∈ ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦(s0 ⋂ c2))))
  eleq2d(c4, (c0[|`t]c2), ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦(s0 ⋂ c2))), (c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3))
  restval(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3)
  elrnmpti(s0, c4, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦(s0 ⋂ c2)), c0, (s0 ⋂ c2))
  eqid((s0 ∈ c0 ↦(s0 ⋂ c2)))
  inex1(s0, c2)
  vex(s0)
}

blocks.name: elrestr
blocks.content: Sufficient condition for being an open set in a subspace. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 11-Jul-2009.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Dec-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm elrestr(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c0)), wcel(cin(c4, c2), co(c0, crest, c2)))
} = {
  3impia(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c0), wcel(cin(c4, c2), co(c0, crest, c2)))
  syl5ibr(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(c4, c0), wcel(cin(c4, c2), co(c0, crest, c2)), wrex(hs0, c0, wceq(cin(c4, c2), cin(cv(hs0), c2))))
  mpan2(wcel(c4, c0), wrex(hs0, c0, wceq(cin(c4, c2), cin(cv(hs0), c2))), wceq(cin(c4, c2), cin(c4, c2)))
  eqid(cin(c4, c2))
  rspceeqv(hs0, c4, c0, cin(c4, c2), cin(c4, c2), cin(cv(hs0), c2))
  ineq1(cv(hs0), c4, c2)
  elrest(hs0, c0, c1, c2, c3, cin(c4, c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cin(c4, c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm elrestr(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3 ∧ c4 ∈ c0)→(c4 ⋂ c2)∈(c0[|`t]c2))
} = {
  3impia(c0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c3, c4 ∈ c0, (c4 ⋂ c2)∈(c0[|`t]c2))
  syl5ibr((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3), c4 ∈ c0, (c4 ⋂ c2)∈(c0[|`t]c2), ∃(hs0 ∈ c0,(c4 ⋂ c2)=(hs0 ⋂ c2)))
  mpan2(c4 ∈ c0, ∃(hs0 ∈ c0,(c4 ⋂ c2)=(hs0 ⋂ c2)), (c4 ⋂ c2)=(c4 ⋂ c2))
  eqid((c4 ⋂ c2))
  rspceeqv(hs0, c4, c0, (c4 ⋂ c2), (c4 ⋂ c2), (hs0 ⋂ c2))
  ineq1(hs0, c4, c2)
  elrest(hs0, c0, c1, c2, c3, (c4 ⋂ c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c((c4 ⋂ c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}

blocks.name: 0rest
blocks.content: Value of the structure restriction when the topology input is empty. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm 0rest(class c0) {
  |- wceq(co(emptycls, crest, c0), emptycls)
} = {
  pm2.61i(wceq(co(emptycls, crest, c0), emptycls), wcel(c0, universe))
  syl6eq(co(emptycls, crest, c0), emptycls, crn(cmpt(hs0, emptycls, cin(cv(hs0), c0))), wcel(c0, universe))
  mpan(wcel(c0, universe), wceq(co(emptycls, crest, c0), crn(cmpt(hs0, emptycls, cin(cv(hs0), c0)))), wcel(emptycls, universe))
  0ex()
  restval(hs0, emptycls, universe, c0, universe)
  eqtri(crn(cmpt(hs0, emptycls, cin(cv(hs0), c0))), emptycls, crn(emptycls))
  rneqi(cmpt(hs0, emptycls, cin(cv(hs0), c0)), emptycls)
  mpt0(hs0, cin(cv(hs0), c0))
  rn0()
  ovprc2(c0, emptycls, crest)
  mpbir(wrel(cdm(crest)), wrel(cxp(universe, universe)))
  relxp(universe, universe)
  releqi(cdm(crest), cxp(universe, universe))
  ax-mp(wceq(cdm(crest), cxp(universe, universe)), wfn(crest, cxp(universe, universe)))
  restfn()
  fndm(crest, cxp(universe, universe))
  diff.hs0.c(emptycls)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm 0rest(class c0) {
  ⊢ (∅[|`t]c0)= ∅
} = {
  pm2.61i((∅[|`t]c0)= ∅, c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  syl6eq((∅[|`t]c0), emptycls, ran((hs0 ∈ ∅ ↦(hs0 ⋂ c0))), c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  mpan(c0 ∈ 𝕌, (∅[|`t]c0)= ran((hs0 ∈ ∅ ↦(hs0 ⋂ c0))), ∅ ∈ 𝕌)
  0ex()
  restval(hs0, emptycls, universe, c0, universe)
  eqtri(ran((hs0 ∈ ∅ ↦(hs0 ⋂ c0))), emptycls, ran(∅))
  rneqi((hs0 ∈ ∅ ↦(hs0 ⋂ c0)), emptycls)
  mpt0(hs0, (hs0 ⋂ c0))
  rn0()
  ovprc2(c0, emptycls, crest)
  mpbir(Rel(dom(|`t)), Rel((𝕌 × 𝕌)))
  relxp(universe, universe)
  releqi(dom(|`t), (𝕌 × 𝕌))
  ax-mp(dom(|`t)=(𝕌 × 𝕌), |`t[Fn](𝕌 × 𝕌))
  restfn()
  fndm(crest, (𝕌 × 𝕌))
  diff.hs0.c(emptycls)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
}

blocks.name: restid2
blocks.content: The subspace topology over a subset of the base set is the original topology. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm restid2(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, cpw(c0))), wceq(co(c2, crest, c0), c2))
} = {
  eqtrd(co(c2, crest, c0), c2, crn(cmpt(hs0, c2, cin(cv(hs0), c0))), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, cpw(c0))))
  syl2anc(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, cpw(c0))), wceq(co(c2, crest, c0), crn(cmpt(hs0, c2, cin(cv(hs0), c0)))), wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c0, c1))
  ssexd(c2, cpw(c0), universe, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, cpw(c0))))
  adantr(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, cpw(c0)), wcel(cpw(c0), universe))
  pwexg(c0, c1)
  simpl(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, cpw(c0)))
  restval(hs0, c2, universe, c0, c1)
  syl6eq(crn(cmpt(hs0, c2, cin(cv(hs0), c0))), c2, crn(cres(cid, c2)), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, cpw(c0))))
  rneqd(cmpt(hs0, c2, cin(cv(hs0), c0)), cres(cid, c2), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, cpw(c0))))
  syl6eq(cmpt(hs0, c2, cin(cv(hs0), c0)), cres(cid, c2), cmpt(hs0, c2, cv(hs0)), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, cpw(c0))))
  mpteq2dva(hs0, c2, cin(cv(hs0), c0), cv(hs0), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, cpw(c0))))
  sylib(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, cpw(c0))), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wceq(cin(cv(hs0), c0), cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c0))
  elpwid(cv(hs0), c0, wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, cpw(c0))), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  sselda(cv(hs0), c2, cpw(c0), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, cpw(c0))))
  simpr(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, cpw(c0)))
  df-ss(cv(hs0), c0)
  mptresid(hs0, c2)
  rnresi(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, cpw(c0))))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm restid2(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ⊆ P(c0))→(c2[|`t]c0)= c2)
} = {
  eqtrd((c2[|`t]c0), c2, ran((hs0 ∈ c2 ↦(hs0 ⋂ c0))), (c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ⊆ P(c0)))
  syl2anc((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ⊆ P(c0)), (c2[|`t]c0)= ran((hs0 ∈ c2 ↦(hs0 ⋂ c0))), c2 ∈ 𝕌, c0 ∈ c1)
  ssexd(c2, P(c0), universe, (c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ⊆ P(c0)))
  adantr(c0 ∈ c1, c2 ⊆ P(c0), P(c0)∈ 𝕌)
  pwexg(c0, c1)
  simpl(c0 ∈ c1, c2 ⊆ P(c0))
  restval(hs0, c2, universe, c0, c1)
  syl6eq(ran((hs0 ∈ c2 ↦(hs0 ⋂ c0))), c2, ran((= |` c2)), (c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ⊆ P(c0)))
  rneqd((hs0 ∈ c2 ↦(hs0 ⋂ c0)), (= |` c2), (c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ⊆ P(c0)))
  syl6eq((hs0 ∈ c2 ↦(hs0 ⋂ c0)), (= |` c2), (hs0 ∈ c2 ↦ hs0), (c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ⊆ P(c0)))
  mpteq2dva(hs0, c2, (hs0 ⋂ c0), hs0, (c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ⊆ P(c0)))
  sylib(((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ⊆ P(c0))∧ hs0 ∈ c2), (hs0 ⋂ c0)= hs0, hs0 ⊆ c0)
  elpwid(hs0, c0, ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ⊆ P(c0))∧ hs0 ∈ c2))
  sselda(hs0, c2, P(c0), (c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ⊆ P(c0)))
  simpr(c0 ∈ c1, c2 ⊆ P(c0))
  df-ss(hs0, c0)
  mptresid(hs0, c2)
  rnresi(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ⊆ P(c0)))
}

blocks.name: restsspw
blocks.content: The subspace topology is a collection of subsets of the restriction set. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm restsspw(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wss(co(c0, crest, c1), cpw(c1))
} = {
  ssriv(hs0, co(c0, crest, c1), cpw(c1))
  sylibr(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, crest, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(c1)), wss(cv(hs0), c1))
  syl(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, crest, c1)), wss(cv(hs0), c1), wrex(hs1, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), cin(cv(hs1), c1))))
  ibi(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, crest, c1)), wrex(hs1, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), cin(cv(hs1), c1))))
  syl(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, crest, c1)), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, crest, c1)), wrex(hs1, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), cin(cv(hs1), c1)))), wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)))
  nsyl2(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, crest, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), wceq(co(c0, crest, c1), emptycls))
  n0i(cv(hs0), co(c0, crest, c1))
  ndmov(c0, universe, c1, crest)
  ax-mp(wceq(cdm(crest), cxp(universe, universe)), wfn(crest, cxp(universe, universe)))
  restfn()

thm restsspw(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0[|`t]c1)⊆ P(c1)
} = {
  ssriv(hs0, (c0[|`t]c1), P(c1))

  syl(hs0 ∈(c0[|`t]c1), (hs0 ∈(c0[|`t]c1)↔ ∃(hs1 ∈ c0, hs0 =(hs1 ⋂ c1))), (c0 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c1 ∈ 𝕌))
  nsyl2(hs0 ∈(c0[|`t]c1), (c0 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c1 ∈ 𝕌), (c0[|`t]c1)= ∅)
  n0i(hs0, (c0[|`t]c1))
  ndmov(c0, universe, c1, crest)
  ax-mp(dom(|`t)=(𝕌 × 𝕌), |`t[Fn](𝕌 × 𝕌))
  restfn()
  fndm(crest, (𝕌 × 𝕌))
  elrest(hs1, c0, universe, c1, universe, hs0)
  rexlimivw(hs1, c0, hs0 =(hs1 ⋂ c1), hs0 ⊆ c1)
  mpbiri(hs0 =(hs1 ⋂ c1), hs0 ⊆ c1, (hs1 ⋂ c1)⊆ c1)
  inss2(hs1, c1)
  sseq1(hs0, (hs1 ⋂ c1), c1)

  diff.hs0.c((c0[|`t]c1))

}

  diff.hs3.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)

  diff.hs2.c(hs1)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)

  diff.hs2.w(hs3 =(hs1 ⋂ c1))
  diff.hs2.w(((c0 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c1 ∈ 𝕌)∧ hs1 ∈((P((c0[|`t]c1))⋂ Fin)\ { ∅ })))
  diff.hs2.w(⋂ hs1 ∈((fi ` c0)[|`t]c1))
  diff.hs3.c(c1)

}

blocks.name: topnval
blocks.content: Value of the topology extractor function. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm topnval(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wceq(co(c0, crest, c1), cfv(ctopn, c2))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c2))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cts, c2))
} = {
  pm2.61i(wceq(co(c0, crest, c1), cfv(ctopn, c2)), wcel(c2, universe))
  eqcomd(co(c0, crest, c1), cfv(ctopn, c2), wcel(c2, universe))
  fvmpt(hs0, c2, universe, ctopn, co(c0, crest, c1), co(cfv(cts, cv(hs0)), crest, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0))))
  oveq12d(cfv(cts, cv(hs0)), crest, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), c0, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cts, cv(hs0)), c0, cfv(cts, c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c2, cts)
  syl6eqr(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), c1, cfv(cbs, c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c2, cbs)
  df-topn(hs0)
  ovex(c0, crest, c1)
  3eqtr4a(co(c0, crest, c1), cfv(ctopn, c2), co(emptycls, crest, c1), emptycls, wn(wcel(c2, universe)))
  0rest(c1)
  oveq1d(c0, crest, c1, emptycls, wn(wcel(c2, universe)))
  syl5eq(c0, emptycls, cfv(cts, c2), wn(wcel(c2, universe)))
  fvprc(c2, cts)
  fvprc(c2, ctopn)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(co(c0, crest, c1))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm topnval(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0[|`t]c1)=(TopOpen ` c2)
  ⊣ c1 =(Base ` c2)
  ⊣ c0 =(TopSet ` c2)
} = {
  pm2.61i((c0[|`t]c1)=(TopOpen ` c2), c2 ∈ 𝕌)
  eqcomd((c0[|`t]c1), (TopOpen ` c2), c2 ∈ 𝕌)
  fvmpt(hs0, c2, universe, ctopn, (c0[|`t]c1), ((TopSet ` hs0)[|`t](Base ` hs0)))
  oveq12d((TopSet ` hs0), crest, (Base ` hs0), c0, c1, hs0 = c2)
  syl6eqr((TopSet ` hs0), c0, (TopSet ` c2), hs0 = c2)
  fveq2(hs0, c2, cts)
  syl6eqr((Base ` hs0), c1, (Base ` c2), hs0 = c2)
  fveq2(hs0, c2, cbs)
  df-topn(hs0)
  ovex(c0, crest, c1)
  3eqtr4a((c0[|`t]c1), (TopOpen ` c2), (∅[|`t]c1), emptycls, ¬ c2 ∈ 𝕌)
  0rest(c1)
  oveq1d(c0, crest, c1, emptycls, ¬ c2 ∈ 𝕌)
  syl5eq(c0, emptycls, (TopSet ` c2), ¬ c2 ∈ 𝕌)
  fvprc(c2, cts)
  fvprc(c2, ctopn)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c((c0[|`t]c1))
}

blocks.name: topnpropd
blocks.content: The topology extractor function depends only on the base and topology components. (Contributed by NM, 18-Jul-2006.)
blocks.origin:
thm topnpropd(class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(ctopn, c0), cfv(ctopn, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cts, c0), cfv(cts, c1)))
} = {
  3eqtr3g(cfv(ctopn, c0), cfv(ctopn, c1), co(cfv(cts, c0), crest, cfv(cbs, c0)), co(cfv(cts, c1), crest, cfv(cbs, c1)), w0)
  oveq12d(cfv(cts, c0), crest, cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cts, c1), cfv(cbs, c1), w0)
  topnval(cfv(cts, c0), cfv(cbs, c0), c0)
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cts, c0))
  topnval(cfv(cts, c1), cfv(cbs, c1), c1)
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c1))
  eqid(cfv(cts, c1))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm topnpropd(class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(TopOpen ` c0)=(TopOpen ` c1))
  ⊣ (w0 →(Base ` c0)=(Base ` c1))
  ⊣ (w0 →(TopSet ` c0)=(TopSet ` c1))
} = {
  3eqtr3g((TopOpen ` c0), (TopOpen ` c1), ((TopSet ` c0)[|`t](Base ` c0)), ((TopSet ` c1)[|`t](Base ` c1)), w0)
  oveq12d((TopSet ` c0), crest, (Base ` c0), (TopSet ` c1), (Base ` c1), w0)
  topnval((TopSet ` c0), (Base ` c0), c0)
  eqid((Base ` c0))
  eqid((TopSet ` c0))
  topnval((TopSet ` c1), (Base ` c1), c1)
  eqid((Base ` c1))
  eqid((TopSet ` c1))
}

blocks.name: df-gsum
blocks.content: Define the group sum for the structure ` G ` of a finite sequence of elements whose values are defined by the expression ` B ` and whose set of indices is ` A ` . It may be viewed as a product (if ` G ` is a multiplication), a sum (if ` G ` is an addition) or any other operation. The variable ` k ` is normally a free variable in ` B ` (i.e., ` B ` can be thought of as ` B ( k ) ` ). The definition is meaningful in different contexts, depending on the size of the index set ` A ` and each demanding different properties of ` G ` . 1. If ` A = (/) ` and ` G ` has an identity element, then the sum equals this identity. 2. If ` A = ( M ... N ) ` and ` G ` is any magma, then the sum is the sum of the elements, evaluated left-to-right, i.e. ` ( B ( 1 ) + B ( 2 ) ) + B ( 3 ) ` etc. 3. If ` A ` is a finite set (or is nonzero for finitely many indices) and ` G ` is a commutative monoid, then the sum adds up these elements in some order, which is then uniquely defined. 4. If ` A ` is an infinite set and ` G ` is a Hausdorff topological group, then there is a meaningful sum, but ` gsum ` cannot handle this case. See ~ df-tsms . Remark: this definition is required here because the symbol ` gsum ` is already used in ~ df-prds and ~ df-imas . The related theorems are provided later, see ~ gsumvalx . (Contributed by FL, 5-Sep-2010.) (Revised by FL, 17-Oct-2011.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 7-Dec-2014.)

blocks.name: reldmprds
blocks.content: The structure product is a well-behaved binary operator. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 7-Jan-2015.) (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 15-Jun-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm reldmprds() {

blocks.content: Structure product weak ordering. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Aug-2015.) (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 16-Jun-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm prdsle(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(c0, copab(s0, s1, wa(wss(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1), wral(s2, c2, wbr(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2)), cfv(cple, cfv(c3, cv(s2))), cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2))))))))
  -| wceq(c4, co(c5, cprds, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c7))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cdm(c3), c2))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cple, c4))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c4)
  -| diffsc(s2, c5)

thm prdsless(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wss(c0, cxp(c1, c1)))
  -| wceq(c2, co(c3, cprds, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, c6))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cdm(c4), c7))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cple, c2))
} = {
  syl6eqss(c0, cxp(c1, c1), copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wss(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c1), wral(hs2, c7, wbr(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), cfv(cple, cfv(c4, cv(hs2))), cfv(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)))))), w0)
  prdsle(hs0, hs1, hs2, c0, c1, c7, c4, c2, c3, c5, c6, w0)
  eqsstr3i(copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wss(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c1), wral(hs2, c7, wbr(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), cfv(cple, cfv(c4, cv(hs2))), cfv(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)))))), cxp(c1, c1), copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c1)), wral(hs2, c7, wbr(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), cfv(cple, cfv(c4, cv(hs2))), cfv(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)))))))
  opabbii(hs0, hs1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c1)), wral(hs2, c7, wbr(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), cfv(cple, cfv(c4, cv(hs2))), cfv(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))))), wa(wss(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c1), wral(hs2, c7, wbr(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), cfv(cple, cfv(c4, cv(hs2))), cfv(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))))))
  anbi1i(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c1)), wral(hs2, c7, wbr(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), cfv(cple, cfv(c4, cv(hs2))), cfv(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)))), wss(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c1))
  prss(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1))
  vex(hs0)
  vex(hs1)
  opabssxp(hs0, hs1, c1, c1, wral(hs2, c7, wbr(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), cfv(cple, cfv(c4, cv(hs2))), cfv(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)))))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c7)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c7)
  diff.hs1.c(c4)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(c7)
  diff.hs2.c(c4)
  diff.hs2.c(c2)
  diff.hs2.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
  diff.hs2.w(w0)
}

thm prdsless(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0 ⊆(c1 × c1))
  ⊣ c2 =(c3[×]c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ c5)
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈ c6)
  ⊣ c1 =(Base ` c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → dom(c4)= c7)
  ⊣ c0 =(le ` c2)
} = {
  syl6eqss(c0, (c1 × c1), { < hs0, hs1 > |({ hs0, hs1 } ⊆ c1 ∧ ∀(hs2 ∈ c7,(hs0 ` hs2)[(le `(c4 ` hs2))](hs1 ` hs2)))}, w0)
  prdsle(hs0, hs1, hs2, c0, c1, c7, c4, c2, c3, c5, c6, w0)
  eqsstr3i({ < hs0, hs1 > |({ hs0, hs1 } ⊆ c1 ∧ ∀(hs2 ∈ c7,(hs0 ` hs2)[(le `(c4 ` hs2))](hs1 ` hs2)))}, (c1 × c1), { < hs0, hs1 > |((hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ hs1 ∈ c1)∧ ∀(hs2 ∈ c7,(hs0 ` hs2)[(le `(c4 ` hs2))](hs1 ` hs2)))})
  opabbii(hs0, hs1, ((hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ hs1 ∈ c1)∧ ∀(hs2 ∈ c7,(hs0 ` hs2)[(le `(c4 ` hs2))](hs1 ` hs2))), ({ hs0, hs1 } ⊆ c1 ∧ ∀(hs2 ∈ c7,(hs0 ` hs2)[(le `(c4 ` hs2))](hs1 ` hs2))))
  anbi1i((hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ hs1 ∈ c1), ∀(hs2 ∈ c7,(hs0 ` hs2)[(le `(c4 ` hs2))](hs1 ` hs2)), { hs0, hs1 } ⊆ c1)
  prss(hs0, c1, hs1)
  vex(hs0)
  vex(hs1)
  opabssxp(hs0, hs1, c1, c1, ∀(hs2 ∈ c7,(hs0 ` hs2)[(le `(c4 ` hs2))](hs1 ` hs2)))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c7)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c7)
  diff.hs1.c(c4)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(c7)
  diff.hs2.c(c4)
  diff.hs2.c(c2)
  diff.hs2.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
  diff.hs2.w(w0)
}

blocks.content: Structure product distance function. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Sep-2015.)

thm prdsdsfn(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wfn(c0, cxp(c1, c1)))
  -| wceq(c2, co(c3, cprds, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, c6))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cdm(c4), c7))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cds, c2))
} = {
  mpbiri(w0, wfn(c0, cxp(c1, c1)), wfn(cmpo(hs0, hs1, c1, c1, csup(cun(crn(cmpt(hs2, c7, co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), cfv(cds, cfv(c4, cv(hs2))), cfv(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))))), csn(nat0)), cxr, clt)), cxp(c1, c1)))
  fnmpt2i(hs0, hs1, cmpo(hs0, hs1, c1, c1, csup(cun(crn(cmpt(hs2, c7, co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), cfv(cds, cfv(c4, cv(hs2))), cfv(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))))), csn(nat0)), cxr, clt)), c1, c1, csup(cun(crn(cmpt(hs2, c7, co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), cfv(cds, cfv(c4, cv(hs2))), cfv(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))))), csn(nat0)), cxr, clt))
  eqid(cmpo(hs0, hs1, c1, c1, csup(cun(crn(cmpt(hs2, c7, co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), cfv(cds, cfv(c4, cv(hs2))), cfv(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))))), csn(nat0)), cxr, clt)))
  supex(cun(crn(cmpt(hs2, c7, co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), cfv(cds, cfv(c4, cv(hs2))), cfv(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))))), csn(nat0)), cxr, clt)
  xrltso()
  fneq1d(c0, cxp(c1, c1), cmpo(hs0, hs1, c1, c1, csup(cun(crn(cmpt(hs2, c7, co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), cfv(cds, cfv(c4, cv(hs2))), cfv(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))))), csn(nat0)), cxr, clt)), w0)
  prdsds(hs0, hs1, hs2, c0, c1, c7, c4, c2, c3, c5, c6, w0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.c(c7)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c7)
  diff.hs1.c(c4)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(c7)
  diff.hs2.c(c4)
  diff.hs2.c(c2)
  diff.hs2.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
  diff.hs2.w(w0)
}

thm prdsdsfn(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0[Fn](c1 × c1))
  ⊣ c2 =(c3[×]c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ c5)
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈ c6)
  ⊣ c1 =(Base ` c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → dom(c4)= c7)
  ⊣ c0 =(dist ` c2)
} = {
  mpbiri(w0, c0[Fn](c1 × c1), (hs0 ∈ c1, hs1 ∈ c1 ↦ sup((ran((hs2 ∈ c7 ↦((hs0 ` hs2)[(dist `(c4 ` hs2))](hs1 ` hs2))))⋃ { 0 }), ℝ*, <))[Fn](c1 × c1))
  fnmpt2i(hs0, hs1, (hs0 ∈ c1, hs1 ∈ c1 ↦ sup((ran((hs2 ∈ c7 ↦((hs0 ` hs2)[(dist `(c4 ` hs2))](hs1 ` hs2))))⋃ { 0 }), ℝ*, <)), c1, c1, sup((ran((hs2 ∈ c7 ↦((hs0 ` hs2)[(dist `(c4 ` hs2))](hs1 ` hs2))))⋃ { 0 }), ℝ*, <))
  eqid((hs0 ∈ c1, hs1 ∈ c1 ↦ sup((ran((hs2 ∈ c7 ↦((hs0 ` hs2)[(dist `(c4 ` hs2))](hs1 ` hs2))))⋃ { 0 }), ℝ*, <)))
  supex((ran((hs2 ∈ c7 ↦((hs0 ` hs2)[(dist `(c4 ` hs2))](hs1 ` hs2))))⋃ { 0 }), cxr, clt)
  xrltso()
  fneq1d(c0, (c1 × c1), (hs0 ∈ c1, hs1 ∈ c1 ↦ sup((ran((hs2 ∈ c7 ↦((hs0 ` hs2)[(dist `(c4 ` hs2))](hs1 ` hs2))))⋃ { 0 }), ℝ*, <)), w0)
  prdsds(hs0, hs1, hs2, c0, c1, c7, c4, c2, c3, c5, c6, w0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.c(c7)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c7)
  diff.hs1.c(c4)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(c7)
  diff.hs2.c(c4)
  diff.hs2.c(c2)
  diff.hs2.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
  diff.hs2.w(w0)
}

thm prdstset(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(c0, cfv(cpt, ccom(ctopn, c1))))

  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cbs, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cdm(c1), c7))

blocks.name: prdsbas2
blocks.content: The base set of a structure product is an indexed set product. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 10-Jan-2015.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm prdsbas2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(c0, cixp(s0, c1, cfv(cbs, cfv(c2, cv(s0))))))
  -| wceq(c3, co(c4, cprds, c2))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wfn(c2, c1))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(c0, cixp(s0, c1, cfv(cbs, cfv(c2, cv(s0)))))), diffsc(s0, c5))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(c0, cixp(s0, c1, cfv(cbs, cfv(c2, cv(s0)))))), diffsc(s0, c6))
  prdsbas(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, universe, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(c2, universe), wfn(c2, c1), wcel(c1, c6))
  fnex(c2, c1, c6)
  syl(w0, wceq(cdm(c2), c1), wfn(c2, c1))
  fndm(c2, c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm prdsbas2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0 = ×(s0 ∈ c1,(Base `(c2 ` s0))))
  ⊣ c3 =(c4[×]c2)
  ⊣ c0 =(Base ` c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈ c5)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c6)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2[Fn]c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, c5)
  ⊣ d(s0, c6)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  a1ii((w0 → c0 = ×(s0 ∈ c1,(Base `(c2 ` s0)))), d(s0, c5))
  a1ii((w0 → c0 = ×(s0 ∈ c1,(Base `(c2 ` s0)))), d(s0, c6))
  prdsbas(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, universe, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, c2 ∈ 𝕌, c2[Fn]c1, c1 ∈ c6)
  fnex(c2, c1, c6)
  syl(w0, dom(c2)= c1, c2[Fn]c1)
  fndm(c2, c1)
}

blocks.name: prdsbasmpt
blocks.content: A constructed tuple is a point in a structure product iff each coordinate is in the proper base set. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 10-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm prdsbasmpt(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c2), wral(s0, c0, wcel(c1, cfv(cbs, cfv(c3, cv(s0)))))))
  -| wceq(c4, co(c5, cprds, c3))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c7))
  -| wi(w0, wfn(c3, c0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsc(s0, c7)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  bitrd(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c2), wral(s0, c0, wcel(c1, cfv(cbs, cfv(c3, cv(s0))))), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cixp(s0, c0, cfv(cbs, cfv(c3, cv(s0))))))
  eleq2d(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c2, cixp(s0, c0, cfv(cbs, cfv(c3, cv(s0)))), w0)
  prdsbas2(s0, c2, c0, c3, c4, c5, c6, c7, w0)
  syl(w0, wb(wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cixp(s0, c0, cfv(cbs, cfv(c3, cv(s0))))), wral(s0, c0, wcel(c1, cfv(cbs, cfv(c3, cv(s0)))))), wcel(c0, c7))
  mptelixpg(s0, c0, c7, c1, cfv(cbs, cfv(c3, cv(s0))))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm prdsbasmpt(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)∈ c2 ↔ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1 ∈(Base `(c3 ` s0)))))
  ⊣ c4 =(c5[×]c3)
  ⊣ c2 =(Base ` c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c5 ∈ c6)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c7)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3[Fn]c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, c5)
  ⊣ d(s0, c6)
  ⊣ d(s0, c7)

thm pwsvscaval(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, class c9, class c10, class c11, class c12, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(co(c0, c1, c2), c3), co(c0, c4, cfv(c2, c3))))
  -| wceq(c5, co(c6, cpws, c7))

  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cvsca, c6))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cvsca, c5))
  -| wceq(c9, cfv(csca, c6))
  -| wceq(c10, cfv(cbs, c9))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c6, c11))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c7, c12))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c10))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c8))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c7))
} = {
  eqtrd(cfv(co(c0, c1, c2), c3), co(c0, c4, cfv(c2, c3)), cfv(co(cxp(c7, csn(c0)), cof(c4), c2), c3), w0)
  fveq1d(co(c0, c1, c2), c3, co(cxp(c7, csn(c0)), cof(c4), c2), w0)
  pwsvscafval(c0, c1, c2, c7, c4, c5, c6, c8, c9, c10, c11, c12, w0)
  mpdan(w0, wceq(cfv(co(cxp(c7, csn(c0)), cof(c4), c2), c3), co(c0, c4, cfv(c2, c3))), wcel(c3, c7))
  ofc1(c3, c7, c0, c4, c2, cfv(c2, c3), c12, c10, w0)
  ffnd(c2, c7, cfv(cbs, c6), w0)
  pwselbas(c2, c7, cfv(cbs, c6), c5, c6, c8, c11, c12, w0)

thm pwssca(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
